title: Full Body Strength Workout With Dumbbells
description:
Today we are slowing things down and increasing our weights in this Full Body Strength Workout with Dumbbells. Added resistance and slow, controlled movements will allow us to focus on building strength and lean muscle - all from home with just a few dumbbells! We will perform 3 rounds of each exercise before moving to the next to make sure we really fatigue each muscle group and feel the burn!! Start with a heavy weight and drop down in weight if you start to notice your form suffering. 

🍎Nutrition Guide: https://heatherrobertson.com/shop/ 
⭐️Free 12 Week Workout Plan: https://bit.ly/3yzAoiO
🗓Free Monthly Workout Calendar: https://bit.ly/3bMZGjU
🎶My Spotify Playlist: https://spoti.fi/3hKdLiV
🙋🏼 My Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/heatherrobertsoncom

 👜 Shop my Outfits: https://heatherrobertson.com/heathers-picks/ 

Workout Breakdown: Warm Up
                                      Lower body circuit, upper body circuit, core circuit. 40s work + 20s rest 
                                     * (aim for approx. 12-15 reps per round)
                                     Cool Down + Stretch 

Equipment Needed: dumbbells + exercise mat or other soft surface. (I'm using a set of 10lbs, 15lbs and 25lbs in this workout)

Where I download my Music *Try it FREE for 30 days*

D I S C L A I M E R

Thanks for watching! 

❤ Heather

comments: Muscles: Every Man's Dream is the best book ever! It boosted my confidence, gave me motivation, and transformed my life in no time.

What I love the most is thst you don't speak thru the whole workout.  Every other person I follow talks thru every move. I love these work outs.

This was a perfect full body strength session. I appreciate the time and care you take to warm up and cool down.  At 69yo I’m so proud to say I can keep up with most of your workouts.  You keep it strong and safe.  And the music is relaxing which makes it a more focused workout. Thanks so much!

Well today is a new day, I have to get back to living , heart is still broken , my  angel keeps pushing me to go on without him. So thank you for the workouts. They keep me challenged and focused on moving forward. I can't do anything about death, it's part of life, so I'll keep focusing on living the best life with my angel watching .
